discover.instruction: Read this news report. Notice the different passive forms.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай эту новостную статью. Обрати внимание на разные формы пассива.

content.text: The discovery <highlight>is believed to be</highlight> revolutionary. Scientists <highlight>are said to have found</highlight> a new energy source. The research <highlight>is reported to have taken</highlight> 10 years. <highlight>It is thought that</highlight> this will change everything. The lead researcher <highlight>is known to have worked</highlight> on similar projects before. The findings <highlight>are expected to be published</highlight> next month. The team <highlight>is considered to be</highlight> among the best. <highlight>It is hoped that</highlight> the technology <highlight>will be made available</highlight> to everyone.
content.question: How do these passive forms combine with other structures like infinitives?
content.question_ru: Как эти пассивные формы сочетаются с другими структурами, такими как инфинитивы?

points.example: He is believed to be innocent. She is said to speak five languages.

points.rule: Subject + be + believed/said + to have + past participle (past event)
points.rule_ru: Подлежащее + be + believed/said + to have + причастие прош. времени (событие в прошлом)
points.example: He is believed to have left the country. (people believe he left)
It is believed that he is innocent. It is said that she speaks five languages.

points.rule: Passive with modals: can/could/may/might/should/must + be + V3
points.rule_ru: Пассив с модальными: can/could/may/might/should/must + be + V3
points.example: This problem can be solved. The work should be finished soon.

points.rule: Passive perfect infinitive: to have been + V3
points.rule_ru: Пассивный перфектный инфинитив: to have been + V3
points.example: The report appears to have been written carelessly.

notice.instruction: Transform each passive into its alternative form.
notice.instruction_ru: Преобразуй каждый пассив в его альтернативную форму.

tasks.text:
News headlines and reports often use these structures:

1. It is reported that the president will visit next week.
   → The president is reported to visit next week.

2. The actress is believed to be planning a comeback.
   → It is believed that the actress is planning a comeback.

3. It is thought that the company lost millions.
   → The company is thought to have lost millions.

4. The criminal is said to have escaped.
   → It is said that the criminal escaped.

5. It is expected that prices will rise.
   → Prices are expected to rise.

find.transformation: Subject + is thought to have + V3

find.original: Subject + is said to have + V3
find.transformation: It is said that + past tense

notice.reflection_question: When do we use 'to be' and when do we use 'to have been' after these passive constructions?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Когда мы используем 'to be' и когда 'to have been' после этих пассивных конструкций?

exercises.instruction: Rewrite using the alternative passive structure.

sentences.original: It is believed that he is the best candidate.
sentences.transformed: He is believed to be the best candidate.

sentences.original: She is said to have invented a new device.
sentences.transformed: It is said that she invented a new device.

sentences.original: It is thought that the economy will improve.
sentences.transformed: The economy is thought to improve.

sentences.original: They are reported to have left the country.
sentences.transformed: It is reported that they left the country.

sentences.original: It is expected that the project will succeed.
sentences.transformed: The project is expected to succeed.

exercises.instruction: Complete with the correct passive form.

sentences.sentence: It ___ (report) that the fire started at midnight.
The ancient city ___ (think) to have been destroyed by a volcano.
The document appears to ___ (write) centuries ago.
The criminal is believed to ___ (escape) through the window.

sentences.incorrect: He is believed to left yesterday.
sentences.correct: He is believed to have left yesterday.
sentences.explanation: Past event = to have + past participle

sentences.incorrect: It is thought that she is leaving next week.
sentences.correct: She is thought to be leaving next week. (OR the original is correct)
sentences.explanation: Both forms are correct; transformation changes structure

sentences.incorrect: The book is said written by a famous author.
sentences.correct: The book is said to have been written by a famous author.
sentences.explanation: Need 'to have been' for passive perfect infinitive

produce.instruction: Write a news report using advanced passive structures.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши новостной репортаж, используя продвинутые пассивные конструкции.
prompts: Report on a political event or decision
Write about a celebrity or public figure
Report on a mystery or unsolved case
produce.example: Breaking news: A major archaeological discovery has been announced. An ancient tomb is believed to have been found in Egypt. The tomb is thought to belong to a previously unknown pharaoh. It is reported that the discovery was made by a team of international archaeologists. The findings are expected to be published in major scientific journals. The pharaoh is believed to have ruled over 3,000 years ago. It is hoped that further excavations will reveal more treasures. The site is said to contain valuable artifacts that have never been seen before.

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with advanced passive structures.

texts.title: Scientific Discovery
texts.content: A new species of deep-sea fish is believed to have been discovered. The creature is said to live at depths of over 5,000 meters. It is thought that only a few hundred exist. The fish is reported to glow in the dark. Scientists believe the species is thought to be millions of years old. It is expected that more research will be conducted. The discovery is considered to be one of the most important this decade. It is hoped that the species can be protected.

texts.title: Political News
texts.content: The new policy is expected to be announced tomorrow. The Prime Minister is believed to support the changes. It is thought that the reforms will affect millions of people. The opposition is reported to be planning protests. It is said that negotiations have been ongoing for months. The deal is thought to have been finalized last week. Some ministers are known to have had reservations. It is hoped that a compromise can be reached soon.

texts.title: Celebrity Gossip
texts.content: The famous actor is rumored to be retiring. He is said to have made the decision last month. It is believed that health issues played a role. His last film is expected to be released next year. The actor is known to have been in the industry for 40 years. It is reported that a documentary is being planned. His contributions are considered to have transformed cinema. It is hoped that his legacy will be remembered forever.

texts.title: Historical Mystery
texts.content: The lost treasure is believed to have been hidden centuries ago. It is thought that pirates buried it on an island. The location is said to be marked on an ancient map. Several explorers are known to have searched for it. It is reported that clues were found recently. The treasure is estimated to be worth millions. It is believed that gold and jewels are included. The mystery is expected to be solved within the next few years.

texts.title: Business Report
texts.content: The company is reported to be planning a major expansion. New offices are expected to be opened in Asia. It is believed that thousands of jobs will be created. The CEO is known to have visited potential locations. The investment is thought to exceed $500 million. It is said that the board approved the plan unanimously. Competitors are believed to be worried. The expansion is expected to be completed within three years. Success is predicted by analysts.
